A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a true Star Wars fan who grew up with the originals\, I will say that this is another good film by Disney\, I believe this was a good follow up to Force Awakens\, I only hope they expand on Snokes story and explain more. Disney keep it up\, Now make a Darth Vader stand alone\, a Darkside movie that truly covers more of the dark side Training etc maybe Darth Bane(he is canon since he was in Clone Wars)\, an Obi Wan with Ewan\, a Boba Fett movies.
